title: Bridgewater Crossings
posting_body: ['Fully Renovated 1-bedroom-', 'Close to Augsburg College & the U of M!', 'Gorgeous, fully remodeled 1-bedroom apartment 5 minutes to Downtown Minneapolis!', 'Beautiful plank flooring in a rich wood-tone finish throughout apartment, updated functional kitchen with sleek wood cabinets and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and built-in microwave.', 'Great closet space.', 'Modern color scheme with cool gray walls and contemporary white doors and trim.', 'Bridgewater Crossings offers residents the best in amenities including a 24/7 fitness center on site!', 'Conveniently located pet stations and on-site card-operated laundry facilities.', 'Our property is centrally located in the historic Seward neighborhood.', "You'll enjoy quick access to many shops, restaurants, parks and much more.", 'Only 5 minutes to Downtown Minneapolis.', 'Close to Augsburg College & the U of M. 2 blocks from the Franklin Station light rail and 1 block from bus line.', 'Bridgewater Crossings Property information:', 'Parking Charges-', 'Parking permits to be allowed to park in the parking lot are $40 per month.', 'Utility Charges-', 'The utilities that you would be responsible for are: electric service through Xcel Energy, gas, water, and trash through AUM RealPage a utility billing company.', 'AUM /', 'RealPage handles this community bill that is calculated by the apartment size and number of occupants.', 'It would be your choice if you want to contract telephone, cable or internet services.', 'Our pet policy-', 'The one-time non-refundable pet fee is $200 per pet (limit 2 pets per apartment) and the monthly pet rent is $25 per pet, per month.', 'We allow cats in all buildings, and new dogs are allowed in our building 2020 only.', 'Apply today!', 'Rental Criteria:', '1.', 'A completed and signed application from all proposed occupants over the age of 18 must be submitted.', 'ALL LINES MUST BE FILLED IN.', 'Incorrect or misinformation will disqualify you as a prospective renter.', '2.', 'A ($ 50.00) application fee for the purpose of running a background check is required with each application.', '3.', 'You must provide a valid photo I.D.', 'We require a photo I.D.', 'Driver’s license or State Issued ID card.', '(Note:  Military cards are not accepted.)', '*', 'It is prohibited by law to photocopy a Military card; therefore they will not be accepted as a photo I.D.', '4.', 'You must have a credit report that demonstrates a willingness and ability to pay financial obligations in a timely fashion (we require a score of at least 580).', 'If we cannot obtain a credit report or you do not meet the credit requirements you will need a Co-', 'Signer, the co- signer must apply and meet all requirements.', 'The amount of the Security Deposit is based on the following on your credit score and is charged as follows:', '• 549-or less Not accepted without a roommate or co-signer with a credit score of 580 or greater.', '• 550-600 1-months’ r', '• 600-649 1-months’ rent', '• 650-or above $500.00', '5.', 'No eviction or unlawful detainer on your record.', '6.', 'No negative rental history.', '7.', 'We require monthly combined income of 2 ½ -times the amount of your monthly rent.', 'Income must be verifiable through pay stubs, employer contact, or tax records.', 'All other income, including self-employment must be verified through tax records.', '8.', 'No Criminal conviction for a crime against a person, for theft, for drug violations or any other type of crime if the crime that the applicant has been convicted of would be considered a threat to the property or to other residents, or would otherwise threaten the ability of other residents to peacefully and safely enjoy the property.', 'In making such a determination as to whether the conviction would cause a rejection of an applicant, the landlord will consider the nature and severity of the conviction and when the conviction occurred.', 'An applicant that has been convicted of the illegal manufacturing or distribution of drugs will be denied.', ' Felony convictions in the last 10 years or a gross misdemeanor in the last 2 years will be reviewed on a case-by-case basis by corporate.', '9.', ' Occupancy: Maximum number of residents equal to two persons per bedroom.', 'Please be sure the following items accompany your rental application:', '1.  Your application screening fee of $45.00 in the form of cash, or money order for each applicant over the age of 18.', '2.', ' Picture I.D. (Driver’s license, Green Card or Passport)']
